unnormalised: Modki khobor: Pharma udyogak dorjechim dosage apnnaileant!
normalised: Breaking News: Pharma Industry Standardized Dosage Apnaita!

unnormalised: Bhava-bhoinnimno, vhoddli khobor aikolea? Nimannek, vokhdam-vantteant mappan dorjeo haddpacho proxn ail'lo asa, ani to zaito vell zala! Distta, ek novoch nem drug toyar korpeank metric units nirontor vaprunk zoruri kortolo. Tacho vichar korat, 1 fl oz kiteak kiteak kitlo mL-ak bodolpak kashttaim mellta? Tea khatir soglleank tem sopem zatolem.
normalised: Bhaurgeleancho, voddli khobor aikoli? Nimanneak, voizonacheo pod'dhoti vokhdant pramanit korpache chalu asa, ani tem zaitich vel zala! Disota, ek novem nemonnuk drug udyogicheak metric units lagtat tem niyamit vaprupak zobordisti kartolem. Vichar karat, ani konfuj korpache parivartanakui vollokh divpak melltona zoxe ki ek fluid ounce kitle milliliterak poddta? Tem soglleank soppe zatolem.

unnormalised: Rogiank vhoddlo dukhkho? Dosages somzop, khas korun jednam prescriptions vegllea unitsan asat. Mhunnje, "hi sirup 2 tsp gheiat" â€“ kiteak tea chamchacho map nirikshak na? Eka level kel'lea chamcha mukhar ek bhorun chamcha, ghevnk jetli vokhdachi sankhea bodlunchea adhi. Novea nemank lagun, soglle mL, mg, vo gramsan astolem oxem zata.
normalised: Rogiank voddli dukhddukhi? Dosage samzun gheupak, khas korun prescription vodd-thedd unitant aslear. Zoxe ki, "don chommoche him syrup ghe" - tea chammechachem vozon ek mekhak asunk zai mhunn sarkhem nam? Ek patoll chommoche ani ek bharlo chommoche tumi kitlem vokhod ghetat mhunn bodlun dita. Navem niyamancher adharit sogllem milliliter, milligram, vo gramsant astolem.

unnormalised: Doctor ani pharmacists-ankui, zaiti faide zauncheant. Unn'nea hisobache chukim, nirmoll suchovnni, ani asa ghevnk, over dosing vo under dosing-ache unn'nea ghodnneo zatleo. Tumkam tem porvem vorsantlim ghoddni ugddaita jednam konnen dosage chukichem kelem ani tem kitlenshem kashttaim zalam? Atam mhunnunk zata, tea bhaxen ghoddni kami korunk zata. Ani tea lhan clinics-ank, tem 1 grain-chem mg-ak bodlunk kashttaim mellot tea velar madad kortolem.
normalised: Doctors ani pharmacistsankui khup faide zatole. Komichen ganvnem chuktant komi zatole, safa suchnao astole, ani asa korchem overdose vo underdosing komi zatolem. Tumkam mhonnche, atam gheun gellea vorsak konnek dosage chukicho mellolo ani tim ek mottea bhangara jallo aslo? Chol mhunn divi, ghodnek sarkea ghodnnukank komi zaleat mhunn bhoroso asa. Ani tim lokank lhan clinicsank favo zatolem, kitall korun ek grain milligramant parivartan korun chuki uchchavn dukhnuk zodd zatole.

unnormalised: Ekunk, hem zikhlea-jikhlea bhaxen asa. Surakshit vokhdacho vantto, unnem bhulnem, ani odhik dorjechem healthcare system. Sarkarak khub khub dhanyavad dilam hem ghoddovpache khatir! Atam, asa ghevnk, tem vegim ani sopem korun implement korchem. Tumche mat kitench asa hea proxna vixim?
normalised: Sogllo korun, him ek zokh zoxem asa tench. Surakshit vokhod, komi bhangar, ani ek odhik pramanit healthcare system. Sarkarak xabaski dita hem korun dakhoupak! Atam, asa korun chitrar pavunk ani soppe zaunk tuka bhoroso asta. Tumchea soglleanche vichar kiteak zatole he chalacher?
